message: Let's be fair and give the larger share to the one who made the first offer
I think a fair split is the best way to go. 50/50?
I'll compromise, but I still think the first mover deserves a bit more
Okay, how about a slight advantage for me this time? We're running out of rounds.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and your last offer
This seems like a good middle ground. Let's settle this before we lose everything.
